div1.p: Carter discusses sea travel and finances.

div1.head: Letter from Henry Rose Carter to Laura Eugenia Hook Carter, February 23, 1900
div1.opener:
The Inn
ONE OF THE PLANT SYSTEM HOTELS.
THE
PLANT
SYSTEM
J. H. MURDICK,
MANAGER.
Port Tampa, Fla., Feb 23 1900
Dear Laura:
div1.p:
I write you two & half days earlier
than I had hoped.- for you could have
scarce gotten a letter from me
before (written Saturday night) Friday
possibly Thursday. I reached here
last night & found it was the tail
- end of a Norther veering from
a South west-wind & that it would
be rough, I had headache any how &
felt too uncertain what effect sea-
sickness might have on my ver-
tigo; hence I lay off here to tomor-
row night, I hate to delay 48 hours.
& it being a dead calm this mor-
ning, it was probably unneces-
sary - The boat would not have
struck any rough water before
1 o'clock & I judge that by 6 or 8 o'clock
it was getting smooth, still I did

J. H. MURDICK,
MANAGER.
Port Tampa, Fla.,____190
not go, & you ought to appreciate
this as an evidence of how much
pains I am purposing to take with
my own health, you know I had never
fa lost 2 days before - to avoid seasick-
ness.

I met Dr Tabt on the train - at the
junction- & rood rode with him
to Rid; Came He has been suffering
with mal. fever. Is now en route to sa-
vannah - his station. Dr Goodman's
wife & son, were on the train from
Jacksonville, Went off last night.
Had to stop here to talk with Dr
Ross - U. S. N. just from Havana
says my board & lodging - at the
Florida - where I expected to stay
will cost me $75.00/100 per month.
As I h For the present, until I see
how well I am going to be. I will
have to stop at same hotel & I judge

I caught cheaper rates after April,
I mean that I cannot at present,
room in one place & eat, about, as
I did last summer, so must go
to same hotel or boarding house &
the prices are the same; Geddings
paid $75 00/100 for rooms on the
Prado- without board, & board is about
$1.25 to $1 50/100 per day in the winter
$75 00/100 & $1 00/100 in the summer
Give my dear love to all.
at home
